titleStmt.title: A plaine and familiar exposition on the Lords prayer first preached in divers sermons, the substance whereof, is now published for the benefit of the church / by I.D. ...
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.D. for Daniel Pakeman, and are to be sold at the signe of the Raine-bow, neere the Inner-Temple gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
